text: Ðis is þara ehteðan healfræ hydæ landboc to eastune þe Eadgar cining gebocode Brihtelm bisceope on ece yrfe.
Þis synd þa landgemero to Eastune.
Ærest on eadmundes wer.
Of eadmundes were on þa ealdan byrig.
Of þære ealdan byrig upp andlang dic to þam eþenan byrigelsan.
Of þam æþenan byrigelsan andlang mearce to þære port stret andlang smalan dune upp to þære dic of þære dic andlang mearce innan blacan lace.
Of blaca lace &lang watæres on costices mylne.
Of costices mylne.
Andlang mearce to þære fulan flode.
Of þære fulan flode &lang stret to þam eafod stoccan.
Of þam heafod stoccan andlang stret innan icenan.
Andlang icenan to þæra grenan furh inna þara stræt.
Andlang stræt andlang mearce on stapol þorn.
Of stapol þorne andlang mearce on þa haran apoldran.
Of þara haran apoldran innan þane smalan weg.
Of þam smalan wege innan þa readan rode.
Of þære readan rode andlang þæs mylan weges.
On þone lunden weg.
Andlang þes lundænes weges innan cealchammæs.
Of cealchammam andlang mearce innan bicafed.
Of bica setle andlang mearce innan fearninga lege.
Of fearninga lege andlang dic æft on icenan innan eadmundes wer.
